index.rule_2: Prediction was draw with incorrect score
index.rule_3: The match winner is correct but the score is not
index.rule_4: Correct score for one of the teams
index.rule_5: Your prediction is draw but the match result is not
index.rule_6: You have guessed the winner of the match, but the score is draw
index.rule_7: You guessed the winner of the match wrong
